playn.core

Class PlayN

  • java.lang.Object
    • playn.core.PlayN

  • public class PlayN
extends Object
    The main PlayN interface. The static methods in this class provide access to the various available subsystems.

    You must register a Platform before calling any of these methods. For example, JavaPlatform.register();.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PlayN.LifecycleListener
      Used to receive lifecycle notifications.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public static void run(Game game)
        Call this method to start your Game. It must be called only once, and all work after this call is made will be performed in Game's callback methods.

      • platform

        public static Platform platform()
        Returns the currently registered platform instance. This can be useful for games that wish to avoid littering their code with calls to the static PlayN methods, and for services that can accept a mocked Platform for testing.

      • platformType

        public static Platform.Type platformType()
        Returns the platform Platform.Type.

      • currentTime

        public static double currentTime()
        Returns the current time, as a double value in millis since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT.

        This is equivalent to the standard JRE new Date().getTime();, but it slightly terser, and avoids the use of long values, which are best avoided when translating to JavaScript.

      • tick

        public static int tick()
        Returns the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since the game started.

      • random

        public static float random()
        Gets a random floating-point value in the range [0, 1).

      • openURL

        public static void openURL(String url)
        Opens the given URL in the default browser.

      • invokeLater

        public static void invokeLater(Runnable runnable)
        Queues the supplied runnable for invocation on the game thread prior to the next call to Game.Default.update(int).

      • setLifecycleListener

        public static void setLifecycleListener(PlayN.LifecycleListener listener)
        Configures a listener to be notified of lifecycle events. Any previous listener will be overwritten. Supply null to clear the listener.

      • audio

        public static Audio audio()
        Returns the Audio service.

      • graphics

        public static Graphics graphics()
        Returns the Graphics service.

      • assets

        public static Assets assets()
        Returns the Assets service.

      • json

        public static Json json()
        Returns the Json service.

      • keyboard

        public static Keyboard keyboard()
        Returns the Keyboard input service.

      • log

        public static Log log()
        Returns the Log service.

      • net

        public static Net net()
        Returns the Net service.

      • pointer

        Returns the Pointer input service.

        public static Mouse mouse()
        Returns the Mouse input service.

      • regularExpression

        public static RegularExpression regularExpression()
        Returns the RegularExpression service.

      • touch

        public static Touch touch()
        Returns the Touch input service.

        public static Storage storage()
        Returns the Storage storage service.

      • analytics

        public static Analytics analytics()
        Returns the Analytics analytics service.

      • uiOverlay

        public static UIOverlay uiOverlay()
        Returns the UIOverlay uiOverlay service.

      • setPlatform

        public static void setPlatform(Platform platform)
        Configures the current Platform. Do not call this directly unless you're implementing a new platform.
